name: Land of Warfare: Battle Maps
storyline:
Land of Warfare is a skirmish map war strategy game. You will need to plan a strategy to build and defend your base from enemy attacks, collect resources to booster your regiment and then defeat your enemies by infiltrating their base. No missions, no unlocks, just load and play.

Pick your battle map, army name and what side you'll represent. Select your map resources level and match victory conditions and you'll randomly spawn on your chosen battle map with your chosen opponent(S)

The peace timer is the only thing that stands between you and the Land of Warfare!
summary: Land of Warfare is a skirmish map war strategy game. You will need to plan a strategy to build and defend your base from enemy attacks, collect resources to booster your regiment and then defeat your enemies by infiltrating their base. No missions, no unlocks, just load and play.
